title: Jemele Hill
description: Samantha Bee talks to sports journalist and fellow podcast host Jemele Hill about how they've both been called out by Donald Trump, what to do when you can't stop waking up at 4:30 in the morning, and if The Rock should run for president (spoiler alert: she thinks he should). Two women talking about sports? Bring on the trolls!
author: fullrelease@sambee.com (Samantha Bee)
